TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Quickly rewiring a faulty condenser mic before a session of Mobile X Cinci.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Always have a side hustle.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: awesome
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: everything

TAResponses.Current_Company: Northwestern University Pritzker School of Law
TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Constructing sound-proof room
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Truly learning FIO: figure it out for yourself.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Getting to know fellow team alpha members at an orange leaf  fundraiser night.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: I learned to always make personal and business metrics smart.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Learning to high-five!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: It helped guide me and give me a strong background for pursuing a technical field in graduate school

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: I loved Saturday Smackdowns! I got to oversee the install and design of the portfolio wall of Awesome Inc partners.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha helped me reach my definition of awesome by gaining real design experience while I was still in high school. I am thankful to still be a designer, at a company I love, 5 years later.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Getting to learn from people with different skill sets from me daily.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha taught me to care about something, to own something, to pursue something, and to win at that something.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: That ping pong table was legit.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha gave me the confidence to FIO. FIGURE IT OUT! Plus a free t-shirt.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: All of it. That feeling meeting everybody that worked there and thinking "who thought I was qualified for this?" It was a crazy good learning experience both in and outside of programming.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha taught me a lot about focus and the importance of direction. I still plan my weeks on a calendar, and keep track of tasks via trello because of working with Team Alpha. On top of that, working around Team Alpha members was a huge lesson in being more humble - everybody was so outrageously talented yet down to earth. I try and apply all of these characteristics to my own work in hopes that one day I will reach my definition of awesome.

TAResponses.Role_on_Team_Alpha: Assistant Director, Graphic Designer, Marketing/Events Intern, Graphic Design Intern,
TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Too many memories... I really love when Brian does The Thing.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha (and Awesome Inc in general) did so much for me.  I met tons of incredibly smart and motivated individuals, explored other areas of the business world and learned how you can still apply your values to your work.  I work at a startup in the tech industry now that aligns with my culture values, and I largely attribute where I am at now to being a part of Team Alpha.
TAResponses.Link_to_Your_Picture: Ahhhh I don't think I have a link of my face anywhere... feel free to email me and I can send you one!

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Mafia Night and winning crowd favorite at the 5 Across Pitch Competition.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: By providing me with a set of skills, experiences, and a supportive team that aided in pursuing a career in my field. Becoming apart of Team Alpha was the first step in becoming an awesome employee, leader, and person.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Sneaking onto the roof
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: I was able to give a voice to the emerging artists of Lexington.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: The Caving Trip!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Honestly, interning at Awesome Inc served as the launchpad for my entire career. Every step of the way, every internship, every side project, and hackathon probably wouldn't have happened without the experience I had with team Alpha.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Pummeling other Team Alpha members with paintballs.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Awesome is contagious. After being immersed in an environment of awesome people doing awesome things at AInc, I am now a part of spreading the awesome contagion as I progress in my future endeavors.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: 2015 Summer Retreat. Rule #17.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Existing in a culture of creativity is a great motivator. Awesome Inc taught me to reach for opportunities. Rule #4: always do something awesome over something not awesome.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: The bootcamp where we all started our own 'businesses', got me started in consulting.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Being a good influence at a time in life I really needed it.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Awesome Olympics
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: It made me realize if you figure yourself out, what you value- creating whatever you want in life comes down to just making a decision do to it. Team Alpha places a premium on helping you with the first part and stretching the realm of possibility for the latter.

TAResponses.Role_on_Team_Alpha: Co-founder of Fresh, A-Game, and Designated Drive-Thru; leading Team Alpha X
TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Doing "The Thing" for the first time
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha taught me to think outside the box, while still focusing on the specific elements that are the most impactful and important to your actual business. I didn't think anything of the free internship opportunity when it was first presented to me, but Team Alpha taught me that hard work towards an end goal you're passionate about is a reward in and of itself.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Mafia Night!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha helped me know what kind of culture I want out of a company and how to make organization succeed!!!

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Meeting so many awesome people!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha introduced me to a community of hardworking people that not only pushed me to excel in whatever I chose but to also be kind and caring towards the community. I still lean on this experience as a picture of what the ideal team looks like in a business setting.
TAResponses.Link_to_Your_Picture: Good bio pic on this page (http://www.uky.edu/Trustees/members/childress.html)

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: We made a fun music video together
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha gave me my first real opportunity to make films, and then I went to NYU Tisch film school. I couldn't have done it without Team Alpha.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Startup Weekend 2015
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: It was a great time to be surrounded by some of the brightest people I'll ever know. So I emulated their best attributes and applied them to myself. Very helpful in my journey of becoming Jake Tapia, the Michael Jordan of Accounting.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: My favorite memory would have to be the Kentucky Entrepreneur Hall of Fame. To finally see the event come together after planning and being able to meet some of our states premiere entrepreneurs was an amazing experience to say the least!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Overall, Team Alpha helped me hold myself more accountable and take my responsibilities more seriously. It adequately prepared me for the real world, and in this truth... to stay true to myself and keep the core values at the forefront!

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: All the 5across events
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: They helped me develop the most important skill learned to date- the ability to FIO.
TAResponses.Link_to_Your_Picture: N/a currently. Should be in the awesome inc  photo google drive

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Get to build a kids playground with team
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: I feel a lot of energy in Alpha Team Members which also motivate me to do my job as good as I can.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Team meetings on wednesdays!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: They constantly invested in my life in and out of work. My skills not only were boosted but my general knowledge of the transition from college to real time working was incredibly lifted. I think I also came into my new job knowing how to carry myself in a respectful and fun manner. The balance was key and I learned that while being there

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Awesome Inc Paintball
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: I learned a new skill of building websites which I now use primarily for personal use and creating websites for others.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: On my first day at Awesome Inc, I was working on a webpage in the lab for about an hour and everyone was silent and glued to their computer. Then, all of a sudden, Brian grabbed a nerf gun and started shooting it indiscriminately at everyone in the office. Within about 30 seconds teams were established and an all out nerf gun battle had commenced. That moment summed up what I loved about Awesome Inc: a professional, hardworking environment that could turn into a nerf war at any moment.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Awesome Inc introduced me to a group of talented, hardworking people who dedicated themselves to helping others achieve their goals. These awesome individuals continue to be an inspiration for me to not only work my butt off to improve myself as a professional but also to understand that it's only worth it if I'm able to help others do the same.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Learning how to change a tire
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha helped me gain the experience I needed to get internships at fortune 500 companies

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Serving Lexington through various Joy Projects
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Expanded my desire to learn and grow into new fields of interest.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Spelunking
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Lots of experience

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Decorating the Awesome Inc Christmas tree!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha helped me realize that being awesome is following your dreams and succeeding at anything you put your mind to!

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: The Ky EHOF event in Louisville that year was awesome! Also the meetings with our personal songs are things I won't forget.
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Awesome Inc was the first place I started doing graphic design work in an office setting. It was the first time I was actually given projects to complete, that I didn't have to find online. My internship at Awesome Inc helped me see that graphic design was something I wanted to really pursue as a career.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: playing ping pong
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Provided a great place to focus and learn

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Pretty much everything!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: It allowed me to work on projects that helped to guide where I wanted to end up in my career.
TAResponses.Link_to_Your_Picture: https://www.facebook.com/garrett.ringler.9   feel free to just steal a picture from my Facebook.

TAResponses.Favorite_Memory_at_Awesome_Inc: Among the quality relationships and experiences that bloomed in my Awesome Inc days, I recall at MobileX Chicago there was a mixup in room keys. I found myself without a room late at night, but bumped into one of the keynote speakers who invited me to hang in his room. Rules 4, 17, 22, & 26 were invoked when no other room was found and Mr Keynote Kagan dared me to take the empty side of the bed next to the speaker from Google. This poor rich man awoke to the sight of a strange bearded fellow, napping to his right!
TAResponses.How_Did_Team_Alpha_Reach_Your_Definition: Team Alpha helped me to take small risks with high upsides.
